text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/mod/mod_access.html offers a link to "You may follow this link to go to the current version of this document." Which leads to the 404:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_access.html
creator: dgvigil@gmail.com
rbowen@apache.org
text: Fixed in r1525232. Sort of. If anybody rebuilds this doc in the future, the change will be overwritten. But nobody should really be touching the 2.0 docs any more anyways.
